entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump "The chaotic culture of the Trump WH contributed to the crisis. A lack of planning and a failure to execute, combined with the president’s focus on the news cycle and his preference for following his gut rather than the data cost time, and perhaps lives." https://t.co/EIqV8R6C3t
